query: hotels in Samarkand with rooftop bars
title: Best Samarkand hotels with rooftop bars
excerpt: Finding hotels in Samarkand with rooftop bars can be a challenge, as not all accommodations promote their stunning views and vibrant atmospheres. This curated list highlights the best options, allowing travelers to enjoy breathtaking panoramas of the historic city while sipping on a refreshing drink. These hidden gems provide not only comfort but also a unique way to experience the beauty of Samarkand from above.
intro: In this article, readers will discover the top hotels in Samarkand that feature rooftop bars, perfect for enjoying the city's enchanting skyline.

hotels.name: Hotel Grand Samarkand Superior - A
hotels.description: Experience the ultimate relaxation at Hotel Grand Samarkand Superior with its stunning rooftop swimming pool and sun terrace, perfect for soaking up the sun. The elegant rooms are designed for comfort, featuring modern amenities like air conditioning and luxurious bathrobes. Savor exquisite Uzbek and European dishes at the Grand Samarkand Superior Restaurant, and unwind with a massage or a dip in the indoor pool after exploring the historic city of Samarkand.
hotels.highlight: Boasts a stunning rooftop swimming pool and sun terrace alongside elegant rooms with modern amenities and an exquisite restaurant.

hotels.name: Shohjahon Palace
hotels.description: Experience unparalleled luxury at Shohjahon Palace, where heated floors and in-room safes ensure a comfortable and secure stay. Relax on the rooftop terrace or take a refreshing dip in the indoor pool, providing a peaceful retreat in the heart of the city. With Registan Square and other historical sites only a short 15-minute walk away, immerse yourself in the rich culture of Samarkand.
hotels.highlight: Offers a rooftop terrace with stunning views, an indoor pool, and complimentary buffet breakfast for a luxurious stay.

hotels.name: Hotel Bek Samarkand
hotels.description: Hotel Bek Samarkand invites you to indulge in luxury with its serene garden, inviting terrace, and on-site restaurant and bar. Each room is thoughtfully designed with modern amenities like air conditioning, flat-screen TVs, and complimentary WiFi for your convenience. Enjoy exceptional 24/7 service from the attentive staff, fluent in both English and Russian, making your stay truly memorable.
hotels.highlight: Boasts a scenic terrace and an on-site bar, providing guests with a relaxing atmosphere to enjoy.
hotels.location: Corner of Shohi Zinda and Dagbed Street

hotels.name: ZARINA SAMARKAND
hotels.description: ZARINA SAMARKAND offers a luxurious escape with a seasonal outdoor pool, elegant terrace, and a delightful restaurant and bar. Guests can enjoy modern comforts in well-equipped rooms featuring air conditioning and flat-screen TVs, with some rooms boasting private balconies. With 24-hour front desk service and convenient amenities like airport transfers and free WiFi, your stay promises to be both relaxing and memorable.
hotels.highlight: ZARINA SAMARKAND boasts a stunning rooftop terrace with a restaurant, offering guests panoramic views and evening entertainment.

hotels.name: Sultan Hotel Boutique
hotels.description: Sultan Hotel Boutique offers stunning views of Samarkand from its rooftop terrace, where guests can savor delicious meals or unwind with a refreshing drink. Each room is equipped with modern amenities like air-conditioning and free WiFi, while the hotel's central location allows easy access to the historic Registan and local markets. Enjoy a luxurious yet convenient stay with exceptional service at this elegant retreat.
hotels.highlight: Offers a rooftop terrace with breathtaking views and a restaurant serving delightful meals in the heart of Samarkand.

hotels.name: Hotel Grand Samarkand Superior - B
hotels.description: Experience the charm of Hotel Grand Samarkand Superior, where European cuisine meets traditional Uzbek decor in a beautifully appointed restaurant featuring an antique piano. Nestled in a serene garden oasis, this hotel offers easy access to Samarkand's Old Town and Registan Square, providing a perfect blend of relaxation and exploration. Enjoy modern comforts like free Wi-Fi, on-site parking, and a delightful variety of dishes and cocktails, all complemented by exceptional service for an unforgettable stay.
hotels.highlight: Boasts a rooftop terrace offering stunning views, alongside a serene Japanese garden and exclusive wine events.

faqs.question: What is the average price range for hotels in Samarkand with rooftop bars?
faqs.answer: Hotels in Samarkand featuring rooftop bars typically range from $60 to $150 per night. Luxury options may go higher, especially during peak tourist seasons, so it's wise to book in advance to secure better rates.

faqs.question: Are there any rooftop bars in Samarkand hotels that offer traditional Uzbek cuisine?
faqs.answer: Yes, several hotels with rooftop bars, such as the Hotel Grand Samarkand, offer traditional Uzbek dishes alongside international cuisine. It's a great way to enjoy local flavors while taking in the stunning views of the city.

faqs.question: What are some tips for booking a hotel in Samarkand with a rooftop bar?
faqs.answer: When booking, check for special packages that might include meals or drinks at the rooftop bar. Additionally, consider looking for hotels that allow flexible cancellation policies, as travel plans can change unexpectedly.

faqs.question: Which hotels in Samarkand with rooftop bars are closest to major attractions?
faqs.answer: The Registan Plaza Hotel and the Grand Samarkand are both centrally located near major attractions like the Registan Square and Shah-i-Zinda. Staying at these hotels allows you to easily explore the city by foot.

faqs.question: Do rooftop bars in Samarkand hotels have specific opening hours?
faqs.answer: Most rooftop bars in Samarkand hotels generally open in the late afternoon and remain open until midnight or later, depending on the hotel. It is advisable to check their hours in advance, especially during off-peak seasons.
